aboutMe.intro: I am Paramjit Singh Bal, an Agriculturist.
statements: We operate a cuting-edge Tissue Culture Lab
We create custom-tailored Drip Irrigation Solutions

df.title: Disease Free Cultivars
df.-: Plants where part of the plant is a seed, gather pathogens from the environment. This increases every generation.

qs.title: Rapid Cultivar Production
qs.-: Plant cultivar is multiplied over the time period of several crop seasons for distribution.
qs.+: Our method can mass produce cultivars from a single bud around the whole year!

sp.title: Resilient Pure Lines
sp.-: Back crossing of the same parent results in weak offspring.
sp.+: We can multiply the cells of a chosen cultivar to maintain strong offspring.
